meanings.definition: A city in Quebec, Canada, located on the south shore of the Saint Lawrence River, opposite Quebec City.
meanings.english_definition: A city in Quebec, Canada, located on the south shore of the Saint Lawrence River, opposite Quebec City.

etymology.value: The surname likely originates from a place name in France. The city in Quebec is named after Gilles Lauzon, a pioneer who settled in the area in the 17th century.
